briefDescription: Our foundation works on helping in education health life style and progress of village and urban poor people . mainly we working for the people who was handicapd , blind and aids positive . we help them morraly economicaly and medicaly . we get great success in maintain aids patients normal healthy for normal work  we help the people in hospitals for the government schems to fulfill there needs we educate girl and boy child's who are not home.
